about_the_game:
Lucia Borthayre will be added as a party member.
Party members can be selected under "Formation" in Main Menu.
New Combination Arts with Lucia will also become available, increasing the variation of skills employable during battles in different team formations.
Furthermore, new events and dialogs featuring Lucia will also be added to the game.

*This content will become available after Chapter 5.
*This content is also included in the "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
